content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of spoken questions based on the content. During the pause, select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.
NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
